Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the earned income tax credit for taxpayers with no qualifying children
Summary: Relates to the earned income tax credit for taxpayers with no qualifying children; such taxpayers shall receive 75% of the credit allowed for those with a qualifying child.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the earned income tax credit for taxpayers with no qualifying children
